uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.hdfs.operation.handler.job.initialiser

Interface JobInitialiser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AvroJobInitialiser, TextJobInitialiser

    public interface JobInitialiser
    A JobInitialiser initialises a job.
    See Also:
    AvroJobInitialiser, TextJobInitialiser

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initialiseJob(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Job job, MapReduce operation, Store store)
      Initialises a job.

    • Method Detail

      • initialiseJob

        void initialiseJob(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Job job,
                   MapReduce operation,
                   Store store)
            throws IOException
        Initialises a job. This will probably involve setting up the job configuration.
        Parameters:
        job - the Job to be initialised
        operation - the MapReduce containing configuration.
        store - the Store that will handle the Operation
        Throws:
        IOException - if IO issues occur
